title: "Machine learning provides a clearer window into ocean motion"
excerpt: "Oceanographers use satellites to peer down at Earth and measure the elevation of the ocean's surface. This information can help them map the circulation of the ocean's currents and understand the role this movement plays in heat transport and climate change."
